entry.RedBlue: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.
entry.Yellow: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
entry.Gold: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.
entry.Silver: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes softer, the external shell hardens.
entry.Crystal: Nearly incapable of movement, it leans against stout trees while waiting for its evolution.
entry.RubySapphire: KAKUNA remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.
entry.FireRed: This POKéMON is in a temporary stage while making its body. It is almost completely unable to move on its own.
entry.LeafGreen: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
entry.Emerald: It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
entry.HeartGold: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.
entry.SoulSilver: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes softer, the external shell hardens.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
entry.X: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself when it is in danger.
entry.Y: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.
entry.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Kakuna remains virtually immobile as it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it is extremely busy as it prepares for its coming evolution. This is evident from how hot the shell becomes to the touch.

Silver: Route 2, 26, 27, 30, 31, 34, 35, 36, 37, 38, 39, Azalea Town, Ilex Forest, Lake of Rage, National Park
SoulSilver: Route 2, 30, 31, 47, Ilex Forest, National Park, Viridian Forest
